com.cigital.insecurepay.dao

Class BaseDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.BaseDao
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountDao, ActivityHistoryDao, ChangePasswordDao, CustomerDao, FileUploadDao, ForgotPasswordDao, LoginDao, TransferFundsDao

    public class BaseDao
extends java.lang.Object
    BaseDao is a parent class that is inherited by all dao classes. It includes core methods of creating and querying results.
